name: Pilam Sky
description: Battles on balloons with the possibility of joint passage by two players in split screen mode (Split Screen). Genres: indie / 2D action / strategy (Indie / 2D-action / Strategy).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: 1.0+ GHz processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated or higher
